pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## m2c**workflow**0. pip install m2c1. mkdir **your-project-name**2. cd **your-project-name**3. m2c init4. m2c build5. m2c run6. m2c debug7. m2c unittest8. m2c pack**coding**0. desgin apimodel.txt1. m2c apicode2. desgin objmodel.txt3. m2c objcode4. coding logic with api/obj...5. coding unittest...6. m2c unittest7. m2c pack8. done
